div.p: This CodeSystem provides coded concepts for event codes in MessageHeader of FHIR messages conveying the content of a catalog.

description.value: This CodeSystem resource provides the concepts representing message event codes to be used when exchanging the content of catalogs in push mode, leveraging the FHIR messaging framework.

display.value: initialize or reinitialize the local catalog from the content of the received message

definition.value: The content of the message represents a new catalog for the message recepient

display.value: update the local catalog with the content of the received message

definition.value: The content of the message represents an update to an existing catalog of the message recepient
